Package org.eclipse.swt.custom

Class TextChangedEvent

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.EventObject
      • org.eclipse.swt.events.TypedEvent
        • org.eclipse.swt.custom.TextChangedEvent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable
    public class TextChangedEvent
extends TypedEvent
    This event is sent by the StyledTextContent implementor when a change to the text occurs.
    See Also:
    Sample code and further information, Serialized Form
